title: Execute a Planogram
description: A merchandising team member needs to reset a section of the store according to a new planogram.

tasks.description: Access the new planogram for the 'healthy snacks' aisle on a tablet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The merchandiser can view the visual layout and product placement guide.

tasks.description: Remove existing products from the shelves and rearrange the shelving as specified in the planogram.
tasks.expected_outcome: The physical shelf setup is adjusted to match the new layout.

tasks.description: Place the products on the shelves in the exact locations and quantities shown in the planogram, and add new price labels.
tasks.expected_outcome: The aisle is successfully reset to the new corporate merchandising standard.
